name: Hatsukoi
nutshell: Hirono Yuusa always believed he was special and destined for greatness – until tragedy struck in his final year of middle school. Now jaded and disillusioned, he's completely given up on trying to be anything more than ordinary. But when he starts to notice classmate Himekawa Ichigo struggling to do his best against all odds, he can't help but want to cheer him on.

name: Koi Monogatari Anthology
nutshell:
Anthology of 5 different stories.

Because There's Fate / En Arite「縁ありて」by NISHI Keiko:
A divorced woman turning 50 wants to have just "one more time".

2.「へるんさん」by EBIRA Hiromi

Sofa Bed Tour 「ソファベッド・ツアー」by TANI Kazuno
At the end of an ordinary day, Joey suddenly finds himself transported up, up, and away.

4.「兄嫁の結婚」by SHIROMIZU Koyomi
5.「ほんぽうふき」by UME Sato

name: Yue Chao Huang Ge
nutshell: The river of destiny rippled, and two small gravels met in the turbulent waves... What kind of sparks would weave between the arrogant and indifferent son of the snow country and the unruly barbarian prince?

name: Yamaguchi Tsubasa Tanpenshuu: Nude Model
nutshell:
Yamaguchi Tsubasa's first collection of short stories.
Content list:

Nude Model (ヌードモデル)
Onnanoko (おんなのこ)
Kamiya (神屋)

name: Blade 2 - The Return of Evil
nutshell:
The biography of a hero who stands against demons that threaten to dye the world in darkness and their journey to Elysium.
Based on a Korean Game Called Blade 2

name: Venom Doctor
nutshell: A college student returned to his hometown to start a chicken farm, but it's not going well. He finds a jade figurine which bestows him martial abilities and lets him see inside people's bodies. With his powers, he cures people from the venom inside their bodies as well as the venom of society

name: Mistress of the House and Maid-Chan
nutshell: A Nagori Yu project, originally posted on twitter, compiled in pixiv

name: Onmyoji
nutshell:
The story takes place in the era where humans and apparitions co-exists, a large number of spirits poured out, resulting in a heavy imbalance between the Yin and Yang world. Kyoto is facing an unprecedented crisis… Can the Onmyoji who is in charge of protecting Kyoto awaken his lost memories? And how will it rewrite the destructive fate of Heian-kyo?
Based on the game of the same name

name: Don't Cry! Juen
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Seitoku Juen, the son of the bathhouse owner, is the naughtiest and the most mischievous boy in his class. He screws up everything he does, and his well-meaning actions always backfire. His parents are angry at him for his poor grades, and the general kids bully him...
However, he has a pure heart and will not tolerate anything crooked. He wants to be a great big brother for his cute little sister, Taishi, but what will he do?

name: Honjitsu wa Ohigara mo Yoku,
nutshell:
Asakura Kai has come to the marriage ceremony of the man he once loved. By his side is his former highschool classmate and now sex friend, Iguchi Keisuke. Kai, who was nursing feelings which had no place to go at the time, was offered a relationship which was convenient for both of them by Keisuke.
Ten years have passed, with Kai unable to ask Keisuke about his true feelings. What are Keisuke’s feelings, standing by my side right now…….? Touched by his kindness, Kai has fallen for Keisuke over the years, but he also can’t bring himself to break off the comfortable relationship they have now.
In the never-stopping flow of time, I experience the end and beginning of love, with you. A sensitive story of overflowing desires.

name: Gaming Stream of the Genius
tags: Monsters,Action,Long Strip,Comedy,Adventure,Virtual Reality,Video Games,Drama,Fantasy,Web Comic,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell:
Lee Do-Hyun decides to live together with his older sister in Seoul in order to re-enroll in college. But his once exemplary sister now turned into an unfilial daughter who became obsessed with streaming games.
Eventually, Do-Hyun is forced to play his first game ever due to his sister’s need for entertainment and donations for her gaming streams. But Do-Hyun reveals his incredible prowess that no one knew about.
A gaming stream with a divinely talented brother and a devilishly greedy sister begins!

name: Baby Cinnamon
nutshell: Hayasaka is a mangaka who just turned in his last manuscript to his editor, Sakurai. Somehow, she loses it before submitting it.

name: The King Of Keepers
nutshell: Hello, welcome to this comic that I made for fun. As the name suggests -The King Of Keepers- is a story about a boy who becomes the King of the great Keepers. Here keepers resembles the Guardians who look over different portals and rule over the realms.

name: Furachi na Ai no Uta
nutshell:
"A" and "B" met at the paradise-like Northern islands; "A" turns "B" into putty in his hands, using honeyed words and an aggressive attitude, but "A" is actually a selfish player! He wants to have both his fiancee and "pig mouth" at the same time, but this causes "B" to fall into an abyss of pain. Caught in this sad three person relationship, will "A's" final decision shock everyone?!
Ch05-07: IT
A free-spirited and flamboyant high-school surfer, Yuuto, is best friends and best enemies with his 'second-in-command' Iusagi. Together with Aminato and Satori, they form a tight, happy-go-lucky clique. Well, until Yuuto discovers, to his bewilderment, that not only is Iusagi gay, but that Iusagi is into HIM! Of course, all it takes is a little encouragement from Iusagi, and timely interfering from the other two nosy sidekicks for Yuuto to see the 'light'. .

name: Shingeki no Kyojin - Tsuioku no Tou (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Erwin x Levi

name: Fools
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Eungi has been in college without being engaged with others. One day by encounter, he finds the secret of underclassman Jeongwoo. Why are you so nervous to forget? A love story that’s both easy and difficult.

name: Tsuihou sareta Ochikobore, Henkyou de Ikinuite S-Rank Taimashi ni Nariagaru
nutshell:
This world is ruled by the Twilight. 150 years ago, war broke out between humans and demons. The humans suffered massive casualties as a mysterious phenomenon called "Twilight" took over the world. In that world, there exists a certain average boy. One day, unfairly abandoned by his party members, he's consumed by the Twilight.
Two years pass. In the uninhabitable twilight, that boy struggles like mad to survive. Eventually, he returns to the barrier city with the powerful skills he acquired in the Twilight. What awaits him next? No matter what, he moves forward, believing that a blue sky awaits him beyond.

name: Touhou - Soshite Mata Higashi no Hou he (Doujinshi)
nutshell: The Three Fairies keep failing to successfully prank Reimu while Marisa does fall victim to their pranks. But Sunny is determined, even if she has to think outside the usual box of pranks.

name: Cold Marriage and Passionate Love
nutshell:
A devastating revelation dawned upon Xia Chuxue on her wedding day. Her husband has been in a long-term affair with her best friend.  At the depths of her despair, she accidentally fell into the water, and lost her consciousness. When she came to, she found herself on CEO Jin’s bed. What she did not know was that she had already fallen into one of the CEO’s numerous layers of traps, and that she has no way out.

Links:

Alternative raw (AC QQ)
Alternative raw (KuaiKan)
Alternative raw (IQIYI)
Alternative raw (Mkzhan)
Alternative raw (Yizhikan)
Alternative raw (Zymk)
Alternative English (MangaToon)

name: Kiken na Honey
nutshell:
Kiken na Honey
One day, Yoshino picks up a very handsome guy that ends up at her house’s garden. This guy’s identity is unknown and filled with riddles. He asks her for a place to stay, and what’s more shocking is that he says to her, “I’ll teach you everything that’s fun.”


Kaizoukei Darling


Kiss Made no Ondo


Motto, Zutto


Gokujou Narcissist

name: The Strike Range of a Blind Swordswoman with Her Escort Target
nutshell: Love is blind, or so they say. Enjoy this (literal) slice of life.

name: Jounetsu wa Arashi no Atode
nutshell:
It was cold in the tropics….
And it seemed to get colder every time Conrad DeVere looked Emma Belle's way. The feeling was mutual. Emma thought Conrad was the most unlikable man she'd ever met.
CARIBBEAN DESIRE
Conrad viewed Emma as a scheming gold digger–a woman who intended to use her position as researcher to Alistair Jackson to part the elderly millionaire from his money.
Emma was prepared to live with Conrad's freezing contempt–he must never know the real reason she'd come to Tobago. But she wasn't prepared for the rush of jealousy that struck her when she learned of Conrad's engagement!

name: Love Comedy Encyclopedia
nutshell: A collection of romcom shorts that are sometimes posted on the artist's twitter.

name: Girls' Frontline - clming45 HK416/UMP45 works (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
A compilation of @clming45's twitter works. Mainly HK416 x UMP45

Author's Twitter

name: Fire Emblem Heroes: Daily Lives of the Heroes
nutshell: Anthology of comics stemming from the mobile game Fire Emblem Heroes.

name: Divine Perspective
nutshell: An accident gave Ye Han an amazing perspective ability. Since then, his life has become rich and colorful, pioneering the strongest business empire, dominating the world of gambling, rejuvenating with one-handed medical skills, and becoming a master of medical ethics. Sitting on billions of fortunes, Loli, Yujie, Jinghua, and the goddess rushed towards him. As a man, but also a limited edition man, Ye Han was under great pressure and had to explore with several grave robbers. However, , A shocking secret that has been traced from ancient times to the present has gradually

name: Dangerous Temptations
nutshell: Je m'appelle Eun Bi. Je sais qu'elle me déteste, elle ne me parlerait jamais de manière informelle. Non, elle va à peine me parler. Mais elle ne veut toujours pas me laisser tranquille. Nous étions amis une fois. Puis elle s’est retournée contre moi et s’est donnée pour mission de ruiner ma vie. J'ai été humilié et bavardé tout au long de mes études secondaires. Mais j'ai fini de me cacher d'elle maintenant, et je ne vais pas lui permettre de gâcher ma vie. Elle n'a peut-être pas changé, mais moi j'ai. Il est temps de se battre.

name: I.L
nutshell:
Imari Daisaku was once an acclaimed filmmaker, but is now at a low point. One day,
he receives a doll named 'I.L' with the ability to shift into whatever its master desires. Imari decides to start a business of providing
stand-ins. Some are for the shameless desires of others, others are for solving mysteries. There are even those who wish for I.L to bust conspiracies.  Whatever it may be, I.L never wears the same face.

Volumes 262 and 263 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works
